title: Hanging Theatre
author: Unknown
pages:
The Hanging Theatre
(this isn't an actual
thing on real Earth
btw)

Why build a hanging
theatre? Just for the
sake of building it?

"No," says the man in
Berlin, "It's because
it's less
environmentally
taxing"

"No," says the woman
in Toronto, "It's
because it costs less"

"No," says the man in
Kinshasa, "it's because
it pushes the limits of
engineering"

But all of these
people, are infact,
wrong. The real
reason I built a
hanging theatre is...

Idk I thought it would
look cool
